alert.note: Alert for Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 12 at 9:22PM CST until December 15 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM TUESDAY TO 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 15 inches. Locally higher totals up to 22 inches along the higher terrain of the North Shore. Ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northern Cook and Lake, Southern Lake and Southern Cook Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Grand Portage Reservation. * WHEN...From 6 PM Tuesday to 6 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lake and terrain enhancement will result in accumulating snow through Thursday and possibly into Thursday evening.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore
